insert into enroll( year, term, lecture_no, user_id, register_dt, approval_cd, approval_dt, pass_course_no, study_time, input_id, input_date, update_id, update_date
) values( (select year from term_cd where use_yn=1::VARCHAR), (select term from term_cd where use_yn=1::VARCHAR), #{lecture_no}, #{user_id}, #{register_dt}, #{approval_cd}, #{approval_dt}, #{pass_course_no}, #{study_time}, #{input_id}, #{input_date}, #{update_id}, #{update_date} )
mapper.delete: delete from enroll where user_id=#{user_id} and lecture_no=#{lecture_no}
mapper.update: update enroll set pass_course_no=#{pass_course_no}, study_time=#{study_time}, input_id=#{input_id}, input_date=#{input_date}, update_id=#{update_id}, update_date=#{update_date} where user_id=#{user_id} and lecture_no=#{lecture_no}
update enroll set approval_cd='승인' where user_id=#{user_id} and lecture_no=#{lecture_no}
mapper.select: select year, term, lecture_no, user_id, register_dt, approval_cd, approval_dt, pass_course_no, study_time, input_id, input_date, update_id, update_date from enroll where user_id=#{user_id}
select COALESCE(pass_course_no,0) from enroll where user_id=#{user_id} and lecture_no=#{lecture_no}
select year, term, lecture_no, user_id, register_dt, approval_cd, approval_dt, pass_course_no, study_time, input_id, input_date, update_id, update_date from enroll

select en.register_dt, en.approval_cd, en.approval_dt, en.pass_course_no, en.study_time, u.user_id, u.pw, u.school_cd, u.position_cd, u.kor_nm, u.end_nm, u.grade, u.ban, u.birth_dt, u.cel_phone_no, u.hom_phone_no, u.gender_cd, u.email from users as u right outer join (select * from enroll where lecture_no=#{lecture_no}) as en on en.user_id=u.user_id
